DataElement.preferredDefinition: The character string identifier in an external information system for the specific portion of a location or organ on or within the human body from which a biologic material sample was taken.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._Named locations of, or within, the body._A position within another named site._Happening or arising or located outside or beyond some limits, or especially, some surface._One or more characters used to identify, name, or characterize the nature, properties, or contents of a thing.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Body tissue, region, surface, cavity, fluid, organ, or collection of organs.
